Package com.penthera.virtuososdk

Class Common.Notifications

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.penthera.virtuososdk.Common.Notifications
  • Enclosing class:
    Common
    public static final class Common.Notifications
extends Object
    Encapsulates the Extras and Intents used for notifications

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  Common.Notifications.DownloadStopReason
      Additional info in notifications to explain why Virtuoso stopped downloading
      One of these values is sent in the notification Intent for virtuoso.intent.action.NOTIFICATION_DOWNLOAD_STOPPED or virtuoso.intent.action.NOTIFICATION_DOWNLOADS_PAUSED, and can be retrieved from the extras with the key EXTRA_NOTIFICATION_DOWNLOAD_STOP_REASON.

    • Field Detail

      • EXTRA_NOTIFICATION_FILE

        public static final String EXTRA_NOTIFICATION_FILE
        The IAsset in the bundle of extras for any Intent contained in the Notifications class.
        When the notification is for either the action INTENT_NOTIFICATION_DOWNLOAD_STOPPED or INTENT_NOTIFICATION_DOWNLOADS_PAUSED this value may be null, depending on whether the engine was actively downloading when the notification was sent.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EXTRA_NOTIFICATION_NUM_QUEUED

        public static final String EXTRA_NOTIFICATION_NUM_QUEUED
        The queue size in the bundle of extras for any Intent contained in the Notifications class
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EXTRA_NOTIFICATION_ENGINE_STATUS

        public static final String EXTRA_NOTIFICATION_ENGINE_STATUS
        The download engine status in the bundle of extras for any Intent contained in the Notifications class.
        This data is only present when the action is INTENT_NOTIFICATION_DOWNLOAD_STOPPED or INTENT_NOTIFICATION_DOWNLOADS_PAUSED. The data it contains is an integer. The integer is one of the values in EngineStatus.
        See Also:
        Common.EngineStatus, Constant Field Values

      • EXTRA_NOTIFICATION_ENGINE_BLOCKED_REASON

        public static final String EXTRA_NOTIFICATION_ENGINE_BLOCKED_REASON
        Additional info in the bundle of extras for an intent which reports the engine status as EngineStatus.BLOCKED. Provides further details on the state of the engine, which may be used to resolve the issue from within the application.
        The data contains an integer which is an ordinal of the relevant enumeration value in EngineBlockedReason. There may be more than one reason for the engine to be blocked, but the notification will only contain the first reason which caused the engine to report the state.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EXTRA_NOTIFICATION_DOWNLOAD_STOP_REASON

        public static final String EXTRA_NOTIFICATION_DOWNLOAD_STOP_REASON
        Additional info in the bundle of extras for any Intent contained in the Notifications class. Provides details on the state of the asset when the notification occurred.
        This data is only present when the action is INTENT_NOTIFICATION_DOWNLOAD_STOPPED or INTENT_NOTIFICATION_DOWNLOADS_PAUSED. The data it contains is an integer. The integer is an ordinal of the relevant enumeration value in EngineStatusInfo.
        See Also:
        Common.Notifications.DownloadStopReason, Constant Field Values

      • EXTRA_NOTIFICATION_EVENT

        public static final String EXTRA_NOTIFICATION_EVENT
        Additional info in the bundle of extras for any Event Log Intent.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EXTRA_NOTIFICATION_START_REASON

        public static final String EXTRA_NOTIFICATION_START_REASON
        Additional info in the bundle of extras for a notification where the action is START_VIRTUOSO_SERVICE and the foreground restart is due to an short lived action and not a general restart of the service for download. This is present when running actions in the background such as server syncs and checking business rules. Only one background notification is displayed at any one time. A notification should always be returned when requested from the notification provider, but if a download is running then it may be best to return the latest notification from that download and not the one for this specific start reason.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • START_REASON_PERMISSIONS_RESET

        public static final int START_REASON_PERMISSIONS_RESET
        Start reason for background execution when asset permissions are being reset following a change in stored assets or business rules.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • INTENT_NOTIFICATION_DOWNLOAD_START

        public static final String INTENT_NOTIFICATION_DOWNLOAD_START
        Broadcast when a download starts
        This is appended to the value defined for the com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.pckg metadata in the application's manifest. The extras will include the number of items in the queue (EXTRA_NOTIFICATION_NUM_QUEUED) and the IAsset that has started to download (EXTRA_NOTIFICATION_FILE).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • INTENT_NOTIFICATION_DOWNLOAD_UPDATE

        public static final String INTENT_NOTIFICATION_DOWNLOAD_UPDATE
        Broadcast when downloading receives an update on progress
        This is appended to the value defined for the com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.pckg metadata in the application's manifest. The extras will include the number of items in the queue (EXTRA_NOTIFICATION_NUM_QUEUED) and the IAsset that is downloading (EXTRA_NOTIFICATION_FILE).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • INTENT_NOTIFICATION_DOWNLOAD_COMPLETE

        public static final String INTENT_NOTIFICATION_DOWNLOAD_COMPLETE
        Broadcast when a download completes
        This is appended to the value defined for the com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.pckg metadata in the application's manifest. The extras will include the IAsset that has completed download (EXTRA_NOTIFICATION_FILE).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • INTENT_NOTIFICATION_DOWNLOAD_STOPPED

        public static final String INTENT_NOTIFICATION_DOWNLOAD_STOPPED
        Broadcast when a download is stopped
        This is appended to the value defined for the com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.pckg metadata in the application's manifest. The extras will include the status of the IAsset that stopped downloading (EXTRA_NOTIFICATION_DOWNLOAD_STOP_REASON).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • INTENT_NOTIFICATION_DOWNLOADS_PAUSED

        public static final String INTENT_NOTIFICATION_DOWNLOADS_PAUSED
        Broadcast when downloads are paused
        This is appended to the value defined for the com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.pckg metadata in the application's manifest. The extras will include the status of the IAsset that was paused (EXTRA_NOTIFICATION_DOWNLOAD_STOP_REASON).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • INTENT_NOTIFICATION_MANIFEST_PARSE_FAILED

        public static final String INTENT_NOTIFICATION_MANIFEST_PARSE_FAILED
        Broadcast when a recently queued manifest fails to be fully parsed but the receiving app has been backgrounded and the registered observer is no longer available to notify of the error. This may occur due to an issue with the manifest or it may be due to the parser being destroyed when the device reclaims memory while the app is in the background. These occurrences should be rare.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • NOTIFICATION_EVENT_TAG

        public static final String NOTIFICATION_EVENT_TAG
        Used to identify event-related notifications in a broadcast receiver
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • INTENT_EVENT_APP_LAUNCH

        public static final String INTENT_EVENT_APP_LAUNCH
        Broadcast when a fresh application launch is detected
        This is appended to the value defined for the com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.pckg metadata in the application's manifest. The extras will include the IEvent object containing the event details (EXTRA_NOTIFICATION_EVENT).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • INTENT_EVENT_QUEUE_FOR_DOWNLOAD

        public static final String INTENT_EVENT_QUEUE_FOR_DOWNLOAD

        This is appended to the value defined for the com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.pckg metadata in the application's manifest. The extras will include the IEvent object containing the event details (EXTRA_NOTIFICATION_EVENT).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • INTENT_EVENT_MAX_ERRORS_RESET

        public static final String INTENT_EVENT_MAX_ERRORS_RESET

        This is appended to the value defined for the com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.pckg metadata in the application's manifest. The extras will include the IEvent object containing the event details (EXTRA_NOTIFICATION_EVENT).

      • INTENT_EVENT_RESET

        public static final String INTENT_EVENT_RESET
        Broadcast after the SDK has handled a remote kill or detected a reinstall of the client app.
        This is appended to the value defined for the com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.pckg metadata in the application's manifest. The extras will include the IEvent object containing the event details (EXTRA_NOTIFICATION_EVENT).

        Constant Field Values

      • INTENT_PROXY_UPDATE

        public static final String INTENT_PROXY_UPDATE
        Broadcast when the SDK has restarted the HTTP Proxy with a different port number than had been used on previous occasions.
        This is appended to the valuedefined for the com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.pckg metadata in the application's manifest. The new port will be found when fetching the asset manifest URI.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
